apps.dependencyInstallCommand: npm install && npm install @rollup/rollup-darwin-arm64 && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('./package.json');p.overrides=p.overrides||{};p.overrides.rollup='^3.21.0';fs.writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2));const v=require('./client/vite.config.js');v.optimizeDeps=v.optimizeDeps||{};v.optimizeDeps.esbuildOptions=v.optimizeDeps.esbuildOptions||{};v.optimizeDeps.esbuildOptions.target='es2020';v.esbuild=v.esbuild||{};v.esbuild.target='es2020';fs.writeFileSync('./client/vite.config.ts','export default '+JSON.stringify(v,null,2))" && npm run build:web && npm run generate-assets && npx cap sync
